## Associated Tutorial

This workflows is part of the tutorial [Long non-coding RNAs (lncRNAs) annotation with FEELnc](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/topics/genome-annotation/tutorials/lncrna/tutorial.html), available in the [GTN](https://training.galaxyproject.org)
